tooltip.clientstorage.merge_same_stacks: Merges same items over 64 in one stack. E. g. having a chest filled with 3 x 64 stone will display 192 stone in one stack instead of 3 separate stacks of 64.
tooltip.clientstorage.location_tooltip: Which button is required to display the location of the item in the tooltip.
tooltip.clientstorage.custom_delay: Delay in milliseconds between each packet sent to the server. Useful if you are using a Spigot (or forked) server and mod doesn't open a crafting menu.
tooltip.clientstorage.packet_threshold: How many packets can be sent at once.
tooltip.clientstorage.focus_search: Focuses the search field when opening the crafting screen.
tooltip.clientstorage.inform_server_type: Different servers (Vanilla, Fabric, Spigot, Paper, Purpur etc.) have different packet settings. If you want to be informed about the detected server type, set this to true.
tooltip.clientstorage.max_distance: Maximum distance from the player's head at which the mod will search for containers.
tooltip.clientstorage.enable_caching: If enabled, the mod will cache the containers after opening and won't send new packets each time.
tooltip.clientstorage.enable_stash_suppo: Whether to show items from your personal stash in the crafting menu.
tooltip.clientstorage.through_block: Allows looking in containers behind blocks.
tooltip.clientstorage.server_setting: This setting is managed by the server.
tooltip.clientstorage.sync_server_config: Whether to ask the server for custom config. If disabled, most strict version of server config will be used.
error.clientstorage.unknown_server: Server type %s is unknown. Please set appropriate packet delay in config.
